DOC.brief_title: Does Sildenafil Increase Exercise Performance Air Pollution ?
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate effect sildenafil exercise performance breathe high level emission exhaust ultrafine fine particulate matter . Exercise performance measure work accumulation ( total kJ ) 6-min maximal effort cycle ergometer ride ( CER ) do immediately 30 min cycle 75 % 6 min mean watt determine familiarization trial . Peak oxygen consumption , cardiac output , pulmonary artery pressure , diffusion capacity ( DLco ) , SaO2 determine trial . Blood urine analyze sildenafil use LC/MS .
DOC.criteria: nonasthmatic asthmatic active participant endurance sport . history high blood pressure history heart disease pulmonary arterial hypertension pulmonary emboli diagnosis moderate severe asthma ( FEV1 < 75 % predict ) pregnant lactating
